short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generates a shareable link to zoho FAQs

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: After running the extension, the script adds a style.css file to the page. Classes in style.css are used to highlight html elements of interest to the user. After clicking on the highlighted item, the getFaqId() function recursively searches for the item with the faqId attribute whose value is the FAQ document ID. When the function finds the FAQ ID, it concatenates it with the base first part of the address. Then opens the newly generated link in a new browser tab. Thanks to this, the user receives a document without an attached form, which can be shared to new employees.
